info.name: Bethesda.net More Forum-like
info.description: Makes the new Bethesda.net 'Community Portal' more forum like and less shitty customer support clone.
info.additionalInfo:
Version 1:
 - Most main pages covered
 - Images removed from navigation and headers, save that vertical space!
 - Some various positions of extra padding and margins removed, don't need all that white space!
 - Topic view has been compressed, extra line spacing removed, generally wasted space cleaned up.
